markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vicious Evisceration](/Feats.aspx?ID=5875) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68), or drained 2 on a critical success.
name: Vicious Evisceration
